tool_description: Combines property data from multiple sources into unified datasets with consistent schema and removes conflicts.

data_sources.description: Array of JSON strings containing property data from different sources

source_priorities.description: Priority order for resolving conflicting data between sources

merge_strategy.description: Strategy for combining data (union, intersection, priority_based)

handle_conflicts.description: How to handle conflicting values (prefer_first, prefer_last, average, manual)

output_format.description: Output format for aggregated data (json, csv, xml)

error_messages: Empty data sources: Provide at least one data source to aggregate.
Invalid JSON format: All data sources must contain valid JSON.
Invalid merge strategy: Use one of [union, intersection, priority_based].
Invalid conflict handling: Use one of [prefer_first, prefer_last, average, manual].
Invalid output format: Use one of [json, csv, xml].
Priority mismatch: Number of source_priorities must match number of data_sources.
usage: Provide multiple data sources as JSON strings and configure aggregation strategy. The tool will create a unified dataset.

aggregated_data.description: Unified property dataset in specified format

total_records.description: Total number of records in aggregated dataset

conflicts_resolved.description: Number of data conflicts that were resolved

sources_processed.description: Number of data sources successfully processed
